Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to prohibiting employers from seeking graduation dates from prospective employees
Summary: Prohibits any employer, labor organization, employment agency or licensing agency, or employees or agents thereof, to seek high school, college or graduate program graduation dates from a prospective employee for an interview or as a condition for employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting employers from seeking graduation dates from prospective employees
